pages.text: $(li)The Abacus is a item that allows you to count the distance between two blocks.$(br)$(li)First, right click a block while you are holding the Abacus in your hand to bind the Abacus to that block.
$(li)After that, it will count the distance between the targeted and hovered block, measured along right angles.

$(li)The Abacus will count up to 48 blocks, drawing an outline of the counted blocks.$(br)$(li)The texture of the item will change according to how many blocks are counted.$(br)$(li)Right click again to unbind.
